tasks.label: Find Node
tasks.command: where node & where python & where py

tasks.label: Find Runtimes
tasks.command: Get-Command node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -ExpandProperty Source; Get-Command python -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -ExpandProperty Source; Get-Command py -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -ExpandProperty Source; Get-ChildItem 'C:\Program Files\nodejs\node.exe' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -ExpandProperty FullName

tasks.label: Phase 4 Cleanup
tasks.command: Remove-Item _phase4_remove.ps1 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; $lines = (Get-Content script.js).Count; Write-Host "script.js: $lines lines"; Write-Host 'Cleanup done'

tasks.label: Phase 5A: Remove dead + safe bridge code
